EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Presence Copilot!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Account.Primary_Contact_First_Name__c},
Thank you for choosing Presence Copilot! As one of the early adopters to Presence Copilot, we are thrilled to welcome you aboard and are eager to get you started.
For next steps, you will receive an email from copilot@luxurypresence.com with access details to the Presence Copilot app. This email will include all the necessary instructions on how to log in and start utilizing the app.
Should you have any questions or require further assistance, please feel free to reach out to us at copilot@luxurypresence.com. We are here to help and ensure you have everything you need for a seamless experience.
